# Load libraries and functions

```{r}
# load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(ggridges)
library(cowplot)
library(bio3d)
library(penm)
library(jefuns)
```


## Check pdb file and read wt coordinates

```{r}
pdb_file <- "data-raw/2acy_A.pdb"
pdb <- read.pdb(pdb_file)

wt <- set_enm(pdb, node = "ca", model = "ming_wall", d_max = 10.5, frustrated = FALSE) 

str(wt)
```


## Get a mutant with update_enm = FALSE 


```{r}

mut <- get_mutant_site(wt, site_mut = 80, mutation = 1, 
                       wt0 = wt, mut_sd_min = 1, dl_sigma = 0.3, update_enm = FALSE)
                       

str(mut)

```
## Get a mutant with update_enm = FALSE 


```{r}

mut_update_enm <- get_mutant_site(wt, site_mut = 80, mutation = 1, 
                       wt0 = wt,
                       mut_sd_min = 1, dl_sigma = 0.3, update_enm = TRUE)

str(mut_update_enm)

```
```{r}
df <- tibble(protein = c("wt", "mut_no_update_enm", "mut_update_enm"),
             v_min = c(
               enm_v_min(wt), 
               enm_v_min(mut), 
               enm_v_min(mut_update_enm)),
             g_entropy = c(
               enm_g_entropy(wt, beta_boltzmann()),
               enm_g_entropy(mut, beta_boltzmann()),
               enm_g_entropy(mut_update_enm, beta_boltzmann()))
             )
df
             

```
